text:
July 28, 1959
Dr. Maurice F. Seay, Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Maurice:
I am taking the liberty of sending you a copy of our
forthcoming NAEB Network offering. I thought you might
be interested in what the nation’s educational radio
network is doing. I also thought you might have particu¬
lar interest in the programs listed on pages 9, 10, 13,
14, 19, 20, 23, 39, 41, 44, 45, 52, and 53.
Sincerely,
hjs:rs
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
